titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to modify the definition of "renewable biomass" under the renewable fuel program.
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to modify the definition of "renewable biomass" under the renewable fuel program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill revises the renewable fuel program to allow the use of additional types of biomass materials in making renewable fuel. Specifically, the bill allows renewable fuel to be made from (1) secondary, residual materials generated from forest products manufacturing (e.g., sawdust or wood chips); or (2) certain biomass materials obtained from federal land.
